Which one of the following options CORRECTLY specifies the number of basic blocks and the number 
of instructions in the largest basic block, respectively ? 
 
(A) 6 and 6 
(B) 6 and 7 
 
(C) 7 and 7 
(D) 7 and 6 
Ans. 
(D)
